About me

I’m currently a Front End Developer at Kenmei, where I build and maintain Adele, and enterprise-level, data-dense React application. I am in addition growing into an Analyst role, refining, planning and estimating tasks for my squad.

Before that, I worked at HYD, a digital agency based in London , where I built all sorts of web applications using Next.js and React, connecting them to diverse backend stacks that varied from project to project. My time there taught me to move comfortably between different architectures, from SSG and SSR setups to fully dynamic SPAs, always keeping performance and accessibility in mind.

My journey started in Front End Conversion Rate Optimization(CRO) development, a role that got me close to browser APIs and introduced me to Performance Optimisation and Accessibility, delivering google CWV audits and coding A/B tests for UK based and International clients.

When I’m not coding I enjoy going on adventures with my dogs, or climbing at the bouldering gym.

Projects

Adele, kenmei's data visualization tool

React | Zustand | Jest | eCharts | Sass

Adele is an analysis tool used by telco engenieers. Widgets and maps on four different dashboards can be individually customized, rearranged, resized. They display complex data visualizations using eCharts. The app handles large global states on filters and user configuration using Zustand and contexts.

Learn More Learn more about Adele

Tradu, landing for a Trading company

Next.js | css modules | Sass

A beautifully designed site for which I worked as single Front End Developer at HYD agency. I proudly developed a design system and fully responsive and reusable component library that served as the base for this site on Next.js. This customizable components were used by our client via gutemberg blocks on wordpress to create all pages and content on the site.

Visit site Visit tradu.com

Everfox, a cybersecurity services site

Next.js | SSR | Zustand | Sass

Everfox is a cybersecurity, data and network company. Built on Next.js, contains a custom large scale component library crafted to match the brand's identity, with subtle, elegant animations building a dynamic and visually appealling site.

Visit site Visit tradu.com

Snippets app, stores your code snippets

React | RTK-Redux | Styled Components | MongoDB | Express | JWT | Ethereal

The front end is built with React, using RTK from redux toolkit, it allows users to create, update, delete and view colour highlighted code snippets in several languajes. API built with plain express, uses JWT for authentication, MongoDB for data storage adn Ethereal for user email confirmation.

View codeView Snippets app's code

Espacios de vida

React | Gatsby | Netlify

I designed and built this site for Natalia Ferrus, an atypical real estate agent who helps people find their dream homes in Spain. This static site is built on Gatsby

Visit espais de vida'ssite

Exchange.ly

Angular | Redux | Chart.js

This app allows users to filter and compare the latests currency rates as well as visualizing historic rates data fetched form exchangeratesapi.io through complex charts built using chart.js

View code for Exchange.ly

Experience

Kenmei - Adele

Front End Developer Oct 2024 - Present

Developing features for a data-dense enterprise React application and translating high-level specifications into actionable tasks. Refactoring legacy codebases to reduce technical debt while leading the build of a DDD-based fetching system using services, hooks, and Zustand. Improving maintainability through a design system refactor, TypeScript migration, and TDD with Jest.

HYD agency

Front End Developer May 2021 - Oct 2024

Creating responsive, wcag compliant and cross-browser compatible web applications using React and Next.js. Building scalable services to consume data form REST and GraphQL APIs by implementing effective state management solutions. Integrating third party products for payments, google services etc.

Writing and maintaining documentation, code reviewing. Liaising with clients and project managers to provide support and technical perspective on viability and time estimates

Dentsu Intenational

CRO Front End Developer April 2020 - May 2021

Conducting A/B and multivariate test for a range of UK and International clients, using platforms such as VWO, Monetate or Goolgle optimize. Building tests based on XD prototypes from our design team and test plans from our strategy team. Adding custom GA and Hotjar tracking events to collect test data for our insights team.
